adjectives.description: superfat (comparative more superfat, superlative most superfat)

examples: In workshops extraordinary scenes would unfold, for example the superfat Apple Hard turned a cartwheel,  […]
Superfats take on more drastic risks in their body positive activism, in return for very little benefit for themselves.

verbs.description: superfat (third-person singular simple present superfats, present participle superfatting, simple past and past participle superfatted)

entries.meaning: To use excess fat in soapmaking to consume the alkali and give the soap a more moisturizing effect.
